description: Calculates NWC peg, detects manipulation patterns, recommends target adjustments for SPA negotiations

anomalies_detected.description: Accounts receivable balance increased significantly by 45% in Q4, suggesting potential collection issues or revenue recognition concerns.
anomalies_detected.evidence: AR increase far outpaces typical revenue or business growth; may suggest sales channel stuffing or slower collections.

anomalies_detected.description: Inventory turnover declined from 8x to 5x, indicating inventory accumulation, potential obsolescence, or channel stuffing pre-close.
anomalies_detected.evidence: Unusually slower inventory turnover may artificially inflate inventory balances and NWC.

recommended_nwc_target.adjustment_rationale: Proposed NWC is based on current reported levels; however, AR spike and declining inventory turnover point to inflated balances. Recommend downward normalization adjustment to account for unsustainable AR and inventory levels.

normalization_adjustments.description: AR and Inventory inflated pre-close; adjust to trailing 3-quarter averages or normalized turnover metrics.

red_flags: Significant slowdown in inventory turnover pre-sale.
recommendations: Scrutinize AR aging and test collectibility to adjust for potentially overstated receivables.
Normalize inventory to historical turnover rates and evaluate for excess/obsolete stock.
Negotiate downward adjustment to NWC peg in SPA to remove inflated balances.
Request detailed reconciliation of AR and inventory movements in Q4.
